attributes.action: Offer a substantial subsidy to any television company prepared to resurect the TV show 'Spitting Image'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Spitting Image was an excellent show which was not only entertaining but brought a spotlight on political behaviour to a much wider audience. It was cancelled because of the prohibitive cost of the puppetry.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
